name: LOST CAVE
description: At an old cave where ancient ruins lie, an unknown life slowly lurks beneath. Put on your gear, become an adventurer, and explore the caverns filled with many secrets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 5 GB available space
